ValidationRule.description: Title & Phone is required if Status is Sales Qualified
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT($Profile.Name = "Automated Process"), ISCHANGED(Status__c), ISPICKVAL(Status__c ,"Sales Qualified"), OR(ISBLANK(Title), ISBLANK(Phone)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill in the Title & Phone when the Status is Sales Qualified
